long_description: The PackTowl Original towel soaks up an amazing 10 times its weight in water and then wrings out almost completely dry. The Large size towel can absorb a full liter of water! Natural, fiber-based fabric gets softer and more absorbent with each washing; machine wash and hang to dry with the convenient snap loop or tumble dry. Multipurpose towel comes in handy around the campsite, in your home kitchen or at the beach. The PackTowl Original towel folds into the included pouch for travel and storage.
short_description: The PackTowl Original towel soaks up an amazing 10 times its weight in water and then wrings out almost completely dry. The Large size towel can absorb a full liter of water!
